menu_output_txt_tip.en: Output current concordancing results to a TXT file
menu_output_txt_tip.zh: 将当前检索结果输出为txt文件

menu_output_html_tip.en: Output current concordancing results to a HTML file
menu_output_html_tip.zh: 将当前检索结果输出为html文件

corpora_list_tip.en: Double-click to load profiles for current corpus
corpora_list_tip.zh: 双击加载当前语料的语料概况

conc_mode_gm_tip.en: Search as what the input is
conc_mode_gm_tip.zh: 按输入检索词原样进行精确搜索

conc_mode_em_tip.en: Search by adding lemmas to the input
conc_mode_em_tip.zh: 对输入词汇进行词形还原、忽略大小写等多重模糊搜索

conc_mode_regex_tip.en: Search the copora by regex input
conc_mode_regex_tip.zh: 根据输入的正则表达式进行模糊搜索

conc_scope_all_tip.zh: 对语料列表内所有语料进行检索

conc_scope_this_tip.en: Search current corpus only, can futher narrow it down to concrete chapters
conc_scope_this_tip.zh: 仅检索语料概况中展示的篇章内容，可通过点选内容列表进一步缩小检索范围

display_opt_context_tip.en: Show the paragraph the result belongs to
display_opt_context_tip.zh: 同时展示检索句所在语段的具体内容

hide_source_tip.en: Hide source information such as book_id, translator,etc.
hide_source_tip.zh: 不展示检索句作（译）者或其他语料来源信息

corpus_pro_content_tip.en: Double-click to view the content, Click or Ctrl+click to select search scope
corpus_pro_content_tip.zh: 双击查看内容，单击或Ctrl+单击可单选或复选检索范围，勿拖选

corpus_pro_tlvn_tip.en: Current Item is the default value for current tl version search
corpus_pro_tlvn_tip.zh: 此处选定的译本将做为当前译本参与当前语料检索

next_button.en: >>>>> Click here to View More Results <<<<<
next_button.zh: '>>>>> 点击加载更多检索结果 <<<<<

next_button_tip.en: Show 100 set of results per page
next_button_tip.zh: 分页展示每100组检索结果

info_welcome.en: Welcome to use OFA ParaConc V.1.0.0
info_welcome.zh: 欢迎使用 傲飞一对多平行检索工具 V.1.0.0

info_copyright.zh: © 2020 英语快餐厅 版权所有

no_corpus_tip.en: No current corpus loaded,please double click certain item in the Corpora List to load one first.
no_corpus_tip.zh: 当前语料未加载，请先在语列料表中双击某具体语料，再进行当前语料检索。

aboout_us_window_words.en:
OFA ParaConc<
Windows (Trial) V.1.0.0
Copyright © 2020 Tony Chang @ English Cafeteria
Author：Tony Chang, Foreign Languages Department ofFushun Vocational Technology Institute (Fushun Teacher's College)

aboout_us_window_words.zh:
傲飞一对多平行检索工具（傲飞检索）
OFA ParaConc
Windows 试用版 V.1.0.0

src_wrd_warning_blank.en: The search word cannot be blank
src_wrd_warning_blank.zh: 检索词不能为空，请重新输入！

src_wrd_warning_regex.en: Regex symbols found. Select the regex mode if you want to search via regex
src_wrd_warning_regex.zh: 您输入了正则检索专用符号，如想进行正则检索，请点选相应选项

src_wrd_warning_punc.en: Punctuations found. Select the regex mode if you want to search via regex
src_wrd_warning_punc.zh: 您输入了标点符号，如想进行正则检索，请点选相应选项

src_wrd_warning_punc_zh.en: Chinese Punctuations can't serve as a search word, please try again
src_wrd_warning_punc_zh.zh: 检索词不能为中文标点符号，请输入有效检索词

src_record_true.en: bi-lingual data found: {total_set} set; {total_sents} items in total
src_record_true.zh: 共检索到{total_set}组双语数据，总计{total_sents}条记录

output_report_ok_txt.en: Current conc results have been successfully saved as a txt file
output_report_ok_txt.zh: 当前检索结果已成功输出为txt文本文件

output_report_ok_html.en: Current conc results have been successfully saved as a html file
output_report_ok_html.zh: 当前检索结果已成功输出为html网页文件

output_report_fail.en: No conc results available for the output
output_report_fail.zh: 当前未有任何检索结果可供输出。
